reviewText: This is not in the English language. This is in German.
nice film about the next chapter in motogp
Great  documentary!! I have watched it twice since I got it.
It was a gift to a friend and they was very happy with the performance of same.
It was a great show and its in English.

It said the regional code was incorrect, so not sure if the dvd could play on an American player, so wasn't able to watch it at all. Tried it in my playstation2, x box, and regular dvd player with same result.
If you are in to Moto GP? This is a must see.... only down fall is I can only watch it on my PC.... Different format then the US DVD/XBOX/BLUERAY. But Nunn the less great documentary........
Its a must for every motorcycle race fan. Excellent commentating by Brad Pitt. I love it and saw it already 3x. Intense and with background insights you have never seen before.
